app.name: Bluemix Backend for Frontend
app.description:
The Backend for Frontend template that demonstrates Mobile services integration with LoopBack, 
Cloudant NoSQL DB, and Object Storage services on Bluemix. The template exhibits common architectural design patterns 
that developers can use to model a backend on Bluemix.

services.name: Cloudant NoSQL Database
services.description: Massively scalable, secure, and continuously operational database

services.name: Mobile Client Access
services.description: Ensure communications with backend systems are secure

services.description: Engage Android and iOS mobile users by sending relevant content including interactive notifications

services.name: Mobile Analytics
services.description: Gain valuable insight into how your app is performing and being used
